data.actual_result: Typing indicator overlaps the characters on 90 zoom
data.expected_result: Typing indicator doesn't overlap the characters on 90 zoom
data.short_description: Typing indicator overlaps certain characters on 90 zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure your zoom level is 100 - type a word that ends in the letter "s" (i used ios) and observe the spacing between the "s" and the typing indicator - Change your zoom level to 90 and observe the spacing again
